name: Magical Girl Clicker
description:
Click & idling!
Gather the hearts of cute girls and see their naughty appearance!
Click on the cute Magical Girl to activate "Fever Mode", boosting your clicking power!
Use the hearts you accumulate by clicking to upgrade your items! Grow to get more hearts!
Achievements make Click useful!
Repeat click and fever mode to produce more hearts!
Appeal point
・A cute wizard animation has been added to the traditional clicker game style.
- Purchasing upgrades dramatically increases heart production
・ Chance to get a lot of hearts in "Fever Mode"!
・Let's get "Ultra Fever Mode" where you can get more hearts!
・Equipped with a convenient system such as purchasing as much as you can, boosting productivity with selected animations, etc.
You can enjoy the traditional clicker game style and the cuteness of anime-style magical girls.
